name: echOS
description:
echOS is a radar-navigation game where you play as an underwater drone trying to escape from militaries.

Evade enemies' traps, trick them against each other, solve puzzles, upgrade your systems and fight the boss.

Average playthrough is about an hour :)

Developed by Andrey Taranovsky
andtargd@gmail.com

  • Maxim Shtabel
